description: Provides rich language support for Typst files
typst.title: Typst
typst.compilation.mode.description: Controls how Typst documents are compiled
typst.compilation.mode.auto: Automatically select the best compilation mode
typst.compilation.mode.wasm: Use WebAssembly-based compilation (offline, runs in browser)
typst.preview.enabled.description: Enable preview functionality for Typst documents
typst.preview.refresh.description: Controls when the preview is refreshed
typst.validation.enabled.description: Enable validation and diagnostics for Typst documents
typst.hover.preview.enabled.description: Enable hover preview for equations and elements
typst.hover.preview.math.enabled.descrip: Enable rendered preview of math formulas on hover
typst.preview.title: Preview Typst Document
typst.exportPdf.title: Export to PDF
typst.shortcut.bold.title: Toggle Bold
typst.shortcut.italic.title: Toggle Italic
typst.shortcut.underline.title: Toggle Underline
